name: pocketdrive
short_description:
Hi,

We have recently launched a Document Storage Application. You have options to store all your documents on Google Drive. You can create category, folders, upload folders, files, sharing, send message to all users, set storage quota for users, view documents on browser/ Google viewer.

It is similar to DropBox, But you can host pocket drive on your hosting/localhost. It has more options. We can host this application on your Amazon EC2, right now it is running on Amazon Cloud server. I have enclosed live demo below, please have look, if it is useful for your business then please let me know.

If you are interested then will give you full source code. It is developed in PHP with MYSQL DB.
summary: Document Storage Application on the Cloud
